src.reward_parameterizations¶

Reward Parameterizations describe how the human’s reward function is modeled. They implement a mapping from omega to a reward

src.reward_parameterizations.MonteCarloLinearReward(…)

This class implements a Monte Carlo Simulation of a linear reward specification.

irl-preference
